name.zh: 囍記茶餐廳 大排檔

meta.name: Hee Kee Restaurant 囍記茶餐廳 大排檔
meta.about: The concept of Hee Kee originated from Hong Kong in the 1970s and 1980s which has derived a unique HK eating style and spirit (economically effective, fast and delicious). 22歲香港妹好掛住香港，好掛住D嘢食，就係咁囍記開業啦！我哋係雙囍，係自由民主國家開展新生活，雙倍歡喜，同香港單喜無任何關係呀～

meta.name: 囍記 · 沃靈頓 Hee Kee Restaurant - Warrington
meta.about: The concept of Hee Kee originated in the 1970s and 1980s which has derived a unique HK eating style!
